BillingPolicy.name: BillingPolicy
BillingPolicy.description: Represents information about a set of billing treatments that define the rules to invoice a customer for an order item.

BillingTreatmentSelection.description: Required. Defines how billing treatments are assigned to order items and assets that are related to the billing policy.

DefaultBillingTreatmentId.description: When BillingTreatmentSelection has a value of Default, the selected billing treatment is used for all the order items and assets that are related to the billing policy.

Description.description: Additional details about the billing policy.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed a billing policy indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed a billing policy. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that the user only accessed the billing policy or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the accounting period itself.

Name.description: Required. The name of the billing policy.

Status.description: Required. The status of the billing policy.

BillingPolicy.accessRules: the Billing Admin permission set to access this object
